remarks: The invariant of the step function ` E ` for Euclid's Algorithm is the ` gcd ` operator applied to the state.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2014.)
statement:
eucalgval.1 $e |- E = ( x e. NN0 , y e. NN0 |-> if ( y = 0 , <. x , y >. , <. y , ( x mod y ) >. ) ) $.
eucalginv $p |- ( X e. ( NN0 X. NN0 ) -> ( gcd ` ( E ` X ) ) = ( gcd ` X ) ) $.
$d X x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
